Description: Blue glazed composition amulet in the form of Bes; laterally pierced at the back for suspension; the headdress has broken away.
Curator's comments: Published in: Regulski, I. (ed.), 2022. Hieroglyphs: unlocking ancient Egypt, p. 207
Exhibition history: 2022-2023 13 Oct-19 Feb, London, BM, Hieroglyphs: unlocking ancient Egypt
